data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hita Garcia, Francisco, Fisher, Brian L. (2015): Taxonomy of the hyper-diverse ant genus Tetramorium Mayr in the Malagasy region (Hymenoptera, Formicidae, Myrmicinae) - first record of the T. setigerum species group and additions to the Malagasy species groups with an updated illustrated identification key. ZooKeys 512: 121-153, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.512.9860, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.512.9860
